name: Young Sea Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 19

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Fin attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Fin
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tidal Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a crushing wave of frigid seawater in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage and 22 (4d10) cold damage and is pushed up to 15 feet away from the dragon and knocked prone. On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.
